thread.title: Igopoof

author: Igopoof
title: Igopoof
text: Since I am a very casual player and don't get a whole lot of play time to sit and wait for groups, I used WowVendor to run me though Karazahn for the achievement and maybe some loots. I didn't get many upgrades since I am fairly well equiped. They were able to easily carry me through and have ways to skip a lot of the unneeded places. That was especially good for me since my time was tight. Very good group of people that I would highly recommend!!
